cause.description:
after the devastating cyclone gonu... ppl were forced to leave their homes and their lands in a state of emergency... the cyclone reached a category 5 and there have been many casualties reported missing or dead ( allah yir7amhum ow yir7am ahaleehum) loss is estimated at R.O 500,000,000, buildings collapsed, streets and bridges broke in half... cars from nowhere were dragged along the wadi taking them everywhere the water went...destructing everything along its way..Omans response as a country really deserves a loud applause.. i love oman and every1 in it, hope u ar all safe.. help us by joining hands and stating our cause...there has not been enough publicity about this matter, and i as well as many others believe it really is a matter to be brought to attention.. this is a nonprofit cause all we ask are your thoughts and prayers.. thank you
1. Oman has come along way... i cannot just sit and watch and do nothing specially when im stuck in australia 100s of millions of miles away from my HOME
cause.mission: help oman return to the way it was and better... IF anyone wants to volunteer, they can call these numbers: +96824692996
cause.name: Oman ya 7abeebaty
